com.samsung.spen.settings

Class SettingStrokeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.spen.settings.SettingStrokeInfo

  • public class SettingStrokeInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    The class for setting information about the stroke.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • SettingStrokeInfo

    • Method Detail

      • setStrokeStyle

        public void setStrokeStyle(int nStyle)
        Set the style of the stroke to change.
        Parameters:
        nStyle - Stroke style
        The stroke style can be one of following styles. SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_PENCIL, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_CRAYON, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_MARKER, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_DOTLINE, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_ERASER, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_BEAUTIFY, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_CUSTOME.
        SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_PENCIL, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_CRAYON, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_MARKER, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_ERASER are compatible style in S Pen SDK, and other styles are for SAMM Library compatibility.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • getStrokeStyle

        public int getStrokeStyle()
        Get the current style of the stroke.
        Returns:
        The style of the stroke that is set
        The stroke style can be one of following styles. SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_PENCIL, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_CRAYON, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_MARKER, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_DOTLINE, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_ERASER, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_BEAUTIFY, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_CUSTOME.
        SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_PENCIL, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_CRAYON, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_MARKER, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_ERASER are compatible style in S Pen SDK, and other styles are for SAMM Library compatibility.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • setStrokeColor

        public void setStrokeColor(int color)
        Set the color of the stroke to change.
        Parameters:
        color - Stroke color(ARGB)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • getStrokeColor

        public int getStrokeColor()
        Get the current color of the stroke.
        Returns:
        The color of the stroke that is set
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • setStrokeAlpha

        public void setStrokeAlpha(int alpha)
        Set the transparency value of the stroke color to change.
        It is only for marker pen(SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_MARKER).
        It the alpha is invalid value, the alpha is set to 255.
        Parameters:
        alpha - transparency value of the stroke color(0-255)

      • getStrokeAlpha

        public int getStrokeAlpha()
        Get the current transparency value of the stroke color.
        Returns:
        The transparency value of the stroke color that is set
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • setStrokeWidth

        public void setStrokeWidth(float strokeWidth)
        Set the width of the normal stroke to change.
        Parameters:
        strokeWidth - Stroke width
        If the stroke style is SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_ERASER, the range of the stroke width is SObjectStroke.SAMM_DEFAULT_MAX_ERASERSIZE,
        otherwise, SObjectStroke.SAMM_DEFAULT_MIN_STROKESIZE <= strokeWidth <= SObjectStroke.SAMM_DEFAULT_MAX_STROKESIZE
        It the range of the stroke width is invalid, the stroke width is adjusted into the valid range.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • getStrokeWidth

        public float getStrokeWidth()
        Get the current width of the stroke.
        Returns:
        The width of the stroke that is set (SObjectStroke.SAMM_DEFAULT_MIN_STROKESIZE <= strokeWidth <= SObjectStroke.SAMM_DEFAULT_MAX_STROKESIZE)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • getBeautifyLineFillStyleIndex

        public int getBeautifyLineFillStyleIndex()
        Gets the filling style index of beautify line for the beautify stroke.
        Returns:
        The filling style index of beautify line for the beautify stroke
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7

      • setBeautifyLineFillStyleIndex

        public boolean setBeautifyLineFillStyleIndex(int nBeautifyLineFillStyleIndex)
        Sets the filling style index of the beautify line for the beautify stroke.
        Parameters:
        nBeautifyLineFillStyleIndex - The filling style index of the beautify line for the beautify stroke.
        The range for nBeautifyLineFillStyleIndex is SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_LINE_STYLE_NORMAL ~ SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_LINE_STYLE_BLUR.
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7

      • getBeautifySlantIndex

        public int getBeautifySlantIndex()
        Gets the slant index for the beautify stroke.
        Returns:
        The slant index for the beautify stroke
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7

      • setBeautifySlantIndex

        public boolean setBeautifySlantIndex(int nBeautifySlantIndex)
        Sets the slant index for the beautify stroke.
        Parameters:
        nBeautifySlantIndex - The slant index for the beautify stroke.
        The range of nBeautifySlantIndex is SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_SLANT_DIR_NONE ~ SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_SLANT_DIR_LEFT.
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7

      • getBeautifyStyleParamValue

        public int getBeautifyStyleParamValue(int nParamterIndex)
        Gets the beautify style parameter value for the beautify stroke.
        Parameters:
        nParamterIndex - The beautify style parameter index. nParamterIndex can be set to one of:
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_CS,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_BM,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_QB,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_KD,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_YY,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_FB and
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_STR.
        Returns:
        The value of beautify style parameter index
        Returns -1 if nParamterIndex is out of range.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7

      • setBeautifyStyleParamValue

        public boolean setBeautifyStyleParamValue(int nParamterIndex,
                                 int nValue)
        Sets the beautify style parameter value for the beautify stroke.
        Parameters:
        nParamterIndex - The beautify style parameter index. nParamterIndex can be one of the following:
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_CS,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_BM,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_QB,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_KD,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_YY,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_FB and
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_STR.
        nValue - The value for beautify style parameter index.
        The range of SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_CS(BM, QB, KD, YY, FB, STR) is
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_CS(BM, QB, KD, YY, FB, STR)_MIN ~ SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_CS(BM, QB, KD, YY, FB, STR)_MAX.
        However, only SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_SLANT_DIR_NONE, SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_SLANT_DIR_RIGHT, SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_SLANT_DIR_LEFT are allowed as values for SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_PARAM_INDEX_STR.
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7

      • getBeautifyID

        public int getBeautifyID()
        Gets the beautify ID for the style set by the button below the beautify tap in the pen setting view.
        Returns:
        The beautify ID for the style set by the button below the beautify tap in the pen setting view
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7

      • setBeautifyID

        public boolean setBeautifyID(int nBeautifyId)
        Sets the beautify ID for the style set by the button below the beautify tap in the pen setting view.
        Parameters:
        nBeautifyId - The beautify ID for the style set by the button below the beautify tap in the pen setting view. SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_ID_RUNNING_HAND_S,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_ID_WANG,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_ID_HUANG,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_ID_HUI,
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_ID_CURSIVE_LM and
        SObjectStroke.BEAUTIFY_STYLE_ID_HUAI can be set as nBeautifyId.
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7
